summary:
DISCONTINUED

Adds the gauntlet Wraithguard to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
MAJOR UPDATE PLEASE READ!!!!!
As of today, this mod will no longer be updated. It will soon be obselete. I am currently working with another modder on making a mod that adds all three Tools of Kagrenac to Skyrim. That is all I will tell you for now. More details may come up in the future

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This mod adds the gauntlet Wraithguard from TES III: Morrowind. Now, please note that this mod does not have custom textures/models, as I have a very limited knowledge on doing those things. So, If you\'d like to help me with that, I\'d really appreciate it.

To get this item, open up the console and type \"help Wraithguard\" without the quotes. Currently, it is not temperable. I will place it in the world somewhere and make it temperable sometime soon.

(I\'ll have some stats for it here in a while)

For people who want the awesome dwarven textures, download the aMidianBorn Dwarven Armor by CaBaL120 here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24398/?

USE: You may NOT use this mod in any other mods/mod packs unless you ask for permission (fyi I usually let people use my mods, so it\'s almost a guarantee, but I would still like to know). Details about credit and such will be discussed in the messages

As for video reviews, go right ahead! Just don\'t forget to credit me with creating the mod, and send me the videos link so I can add it to the page!!
author: themusician6
